title: [1.4.7][FORGE][SSP/SMP]EnergyIntergrations - 通用电力IC2电力转换插件
author: wuyuanyi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 wuyuanyi 于 2013-2-4 18:40 编辑 

玩导弹的同学，是否厌倦了通用电力里的煤电机了？


不废话，看图就知道了




3HG9Q.png (171.48 KB, 下载次数: 6)

下载附件

2013-2-4 15:18 上传





http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=332734&uk=271849257
下载地址如上，搬运自IC2论坛，好像没发过吧？

顺便附上原文翻译

这个mod是用于适配IC的机器和UE机器的，把它放进mods文件夹，并且装好工业mod这个模组就安装了。
需要注意的是这个mod还在开发中（有什么问题的话等待更新！）
mod需要的东西mc1.4.7
forge 491
ic2
ue1.23


转化率是500WATTS/JOULE每eu （- -ue中的电都是动辄上M的），config文件可以修改。
想帮助开发，去 https://github.com/calclavia/Energy-Integrations
Energy Integrations is a module for native Universal Electricity compatibility for IndustrialCraft machines! Drop it in the mods folder along with IndustrialCraft and you will have it automatically installed. To sum it up on a few words, this is what it does.



Download
Note that the module is still in development, but can be downloaded here:
Requires:
Minecraft 1.4.7
Minecraft Forge
IndustrialCraft 2
UE Mod with Universal Electricity v1.2.3

If the download links might happen to be outdated, you may look for them here: http://universalelectricity.com/
Download v0.0.1.7 

The conversion rates are approximately 500 Watts/Joules per IC2 EU. This can be configured in the config file.

If you are interested in helping our with the development, you may visit the Github: https://github.com/calclavia/Energy-Integrations
The mod is open source under the Minecraft Mod Public License (same as Universal Electricity).
